    • Constructor Detail

      • ChargeUserParameters

        public ChargeUserParameters(java.lang.String subscriberNumber,
                    java.lang.String referenceCode,
                    java.math.BigDecimal amount)
        Defines parameters for charging a subscriber.
        Parameters:
        subscriberNumber - The ten digit subscriber number with format 9xxxxxxxxx.
        referenceCode - Unique reference code to identify the transaction.
        amount - Currency format. Must be only up to two decimal places.

        Transforms the parameters plus the access token into a JSON formatted StringEntity.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Access token for the given subscriber.
        Returns:
